articles.title: Pressure is on Japan, says record-breaking Socceroos coach - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Record-breaking Socceroos coach Graham Arnold has piled the pressure on a struggling Japan ahead Tuesday night’s World Cup qualifier between the Asian Football Confederation heavyweights in Saitama.
articles.content: Having set a record for consecutive wins in a single World Cup qualifying campaign, the Socceroos are aiming for 12 in a row with a victory over Japan.Record-breaking Socceroos coach Graham Arnold ha… [+2869 chars]

articles.title: Explainer: How China flights near Taiwan enflame tensions - CNA
articles.description:
BANGKOK: A recent spate of Chinese military flights off southwestern Taiwan has prompted alarm from the island, which Beijing claims as its own, and is increasing tensions in a region already on edge.

The flights are one piece of a complex puzzle in Asia, …

articles.title: Singapore, South Korea to allow quarantine-free travel from Nov 15 for those vaccinated - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): People vaccinated against Covid-19 will be able to travel between Singapore and South Korea without quarantine from Nov 15.
